method.name: _spawn_custom
method.description:
Virtual method called when spawning a custom node, either on the multiplayer authority or on a puppet.
Do not add custom nodes to the scene, as this is done automatically.

method.name: spawn_custom
method.description: Request, as the multiplayer authority, to spawn a node on all clients. Calls [method _spawn_custom] internally.

members.member: Maxmium node count that can be spawned. Includes both custom spawns and spawned scenes. A value of 0 means no limit.
Parent node that listens for spawnable children. Custom spawned nodes are added here too.
Array of scenes that, when added as a child of [member spawn_path], are automatically spawned on multiplayer puppets.

signal.name: despawned
signal.description: Signal emitted after the multiplayer authority despawns a scene instance. Not called for custom spawns.

signal.name: spawned
signal.description: Signal emitted after the multiplayer authority spawns a scene instance. Not called for custom spawns.
